title: Pool party Voliber for 2019 ,Riot what do you say?

replies.body:
Cool Crabby Skarner skin, good idea ;3. I also feel the need to point out that this is a beach and not a pool, but I'm sure Voli could wear the same thing at a pool. 

He doesn't really have much in the way of spell effects and whatnot though, so I'm not really sure what they could do to make it fit more with the pool party theme.
Not sure why it matters if it's a beach or a pool.  Like half of the pool party cast are actually at a beach.
It doesn't matter in the slightest, I just like pointing things out. Pointing can be fun, especially if you're running at something and yelling "Demacia!".

Volibear dosen't have any spell effects.
he might, but no one plays him.
E V E R.
